The forum requires you to use a prefix in the help forums and all other that require a prefix, but there is no option to chose a tag on a mobile version so I can't post there.

What kind of device are you browsing at?

If it's some high-end device (e.g. Samsung Galaxy S3 or higher, most tablets over 100Ã¢â€šÂ¬, most wi-fi equipped nokias), you can request the standard site in your browser settings. However, you may have issues with scrolling, since the page will be much wider than your screen.

Moved to the Forum Forum.

It's a known issue, but getting it fixed may require manual edits to the forum's code... which makes updating things tricky. There's some talk about updating the forums to vBulletin v5 soon, so hopefully that sorts it out.

What kind of device are you browsing at?

If it's some high-end device (e.g. Samsung Galaxy S3 or higher, most tablets over 100Ã¢â€šÂ¬, most wi-fi equipped nokias), you can request the standard site in your browser settings. However, you may have issues with scrolling, since the page will be much wider than your screen.

Nexus 5

Standard site works but its not nearly as convenient as the mobile version.
As you can read from the Daily Kerbal, an update to the forums is in the works. Perhaps that will fix it. If not, we can always take another look
